fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Revenge: When you die, privately deal 2 HP of Unblockable damage to a player of your choice at the end of the phase. Must be chosen by the end of the phase following your death.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Underground King: Visit the Underground Lair this Night phase on top of a regular room. [1 use, Unique] 
- Bribe: Give a Chaos member a Priority Bonus for the following Night phase. [X uses, Graveyard]  *X = (# of Chaos members - 1)* 
- Emulate: Choose an Order non-Unique ability and give __one__ use of it to a Chaos member that isnâ€™t yourself. If the ability recharges, the given ability will not carry the modifier. [X uses, Graveyard]. *X = (# of Chaos members - 1)*
